title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Bengals HC Zac Taylor on Burrow, Deshaun Watson Trade Talk with Mike Silver, NFL Week 8 Bets
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Bengals HC Zac Taylor on Burrow, Deshaun Watson Trade Talk with Mike Silver, NFL Week 8 Bets
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First Colin's top takes of the week on why the media is terrified to criticize Patrick Mahomes, what Baker Mayfield has in common with Zoom and Bitcoin, and what message Bill Belichick was sending by running up the score on the Jets (3:00). Then, Bengals HC Zac Taylor and Colin discuss the first time he saw Joe Burrow and how they’ve developed their relationship (11:00), and what sold them on taking superstar rookie WR Ja'Marr Chase with the 5th overall pick in the draft (18:00). Longtime NFL writer Mike Silver and Colin look at which teams should seriously consider acquiring Deshaun Watson (23:00), and why the Raiders are thriving following Jon Gruden's ugly exit (27:00). And finally, The Action Network CCO Chad Millman tells Colin if his Cowboys/Vikings and Bucs/Saints NFL Week 8 picks are "sharp" or "square". Colin also discusses his zoom call with Tom Brady and why heavy NFL favorites are covering more (32:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
